name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForChronicLiverDiseases
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Chronic Liver Diseases
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to chronic liver (hepatic) disease and is listed as a gastrointestinal/liver disease on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes chronic liver (hepatic) disease. It includes metabolic and genetic disorders that affect the liver (e.g., Alpha-1-antitrypsin deficiency) as well as infectious, autoimmune and toxic causes leading to hepatic fibrosis and/or cirrhosis.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes acute and subacute liver failure.)
